choice_text: To provide information useful for making decisions about providing resources to the entity
To determine the taxable income of the entity
To assess management performance for bonus purposes
A present economic resource controlled by the entity as a result of past events
Cash or items convertible to cash within one year
Resources that will definitely generate future cash flows
At the original cost to the contributing partner
At the agreed value by the partners
At the book value in the partner's records
At the lower of cost or market value
Charged to the old partners' capital accounts
Partners' capitals, then partners' loans, then outside creditors
Outside creditors, then partners' capitals, then partners' loans
Outside creditors, then partners' loans, then partners' capitals
Partners' loans, then outside creditors, then partners' capitals
Reciprocal accounts that should be equal
Fair value at the acquisition date
To detect all fraud in the financial statements
To express an opinion on whether the financial statements are fairly presented
To guarantee the accuracy of the financial statements
To prepare the financial statements for the client
Documentary evidence obtained directly from external third parties
Cause the auditor to modify the opinion
Influence the economic decisions of users
Six months from the balance sheet date
At least twelve months from the balance sheet date
Three years from the balance sheet date
Realized and recognized, whether in cash or in kind
Income from sources within and without the Philippines
Proceeds of life insurance paid to beneficiaries upon death of insured
Rice subsidy of P2,500 per month
Rice subsidy of P2,000 per month or one sack of 50kg rice per month
Any amount of rice given by employer
Rice subsidy given once a year
Sales price minus fixed cost per unit
Sales price minus variable cost per unit
Sales price minus total cost per unit
Variable cost minus fixed cost per unit
A cost that has already been incurred and cannot be changed
A cost that will change based on the decision made
More materials were used than standard
Materials were purchased at a price lower than standard
Materials were purchased at a price higher than standard
Less materials were used than standard
Voidable at the option of the incapacitated person or guardian
An unconditional promise or order to pay a sum certain in money
